function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduction in waste management due to concerns about virus spread","Impact":"Increased risk of uncontrolled waste accumulation and environmental pollution","Mitigation":"Implement alternative waste management methods and disinfection protocols to ensure safe handling of waste","Technologies":"Disinfection equipment, waste collection robotics, and remote monitoring systems","People":"Residents, waste management workers, and environmental ecosystems","Owner":"Local government authorities and waste management organizations"},{"Description":"Suspension of recycling programs due to virus spread concerns","Impact":"Increase in non-recyclable waste production and landfill usage","Mitigation":"Enhance sanitation protocols in recycling centers and promote household waste sorting practices","Technologies":"Sanitization equipment, waste sorting robots, and educational campaigns","People":"Recycling center workers, residents, and environmental advocates","Owner":"Municipal authorities, recycling companies, and environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Decrease in noise levels due to reduced transportation and commercial activities","Impact":"Disruption of natural ecosystem balance and potential impact on wildlife behavior","Mitigation":"Implement zoning regulations, noise barriers, and urban planning measures to minimize disruptions","Technologies":"Acoustic monitoring devices, noise-canceling barriers, and urban planning software","People":"Residents, wildlife, and environmental conservation organizations","Owner":"Local governments, urban planning agencies, and environmental authorities"}]}
